Package com.example.app.repository

Class ProjectRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.repository.GeneralRepository<Project>
com.example.app.repository.ProjectRepository
public class ProjectRepository extends GeneralRepository<Project>
Repository class for Project. This class extends the GeneralRepository class to provide CRUD operations for Project objects.
See Also:
